Row.Text: Enemy Units within two tiles of this city have -10% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Provides free Walls in this city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from [ICON_RES_INCENSE] Incense and [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine. Reduces [ICON_HAPPINESS_3] Religious Unrest.
Sturdy Medieval Era unit that recovers quickly when beginning on pillaged Farms, Trading Posts, Towns, and Villages, and resists Ranged Attacks. Only Wallachia may build it.

The unique Lefegii is the Longswordsman replacement for Wallachia. Unlike the Longswordsman, this unit is very resilient to damage, especially from Ranged Attacks. It gains a 20% Defensive bonus against all Ranged Attacks and heals 5 damage each turn that it begins on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village. Lefegii will likely sustain themselves well for long, drawn-out wars.
When beginning its turn on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]HEALS[ENDCOLOR] an extra +5 damage.
Whilst beginning its turn on a pillaged Farm, Trading Post, Town, or Village, [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]HEALS[ENDCOLOR] an extra +5 damage.
Front of Socialist Unity and Democracy

Our experimentation with gunpowder has yielded devastating success. To take this advantage over our enemies, we must not hesitate to incorporate this fearsome weapon into our elite forces. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Wallachia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Gunpowder. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks training of Lefegii that possess greater [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All currently active Lefegii are upgraded to this units. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Note: The [ICON_GOLD] Gold cost increases with every Lefegii you currently have.

Our experimentation with gunpowder has yielded devastating success. To take this advantage over our enemies, we must not hesitate to incorporate this fearsome weapon into our elite forces. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Unlocks training of Lefegii that possess greater [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]All currently active Lefegii are upgraded to this units.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has adopted firearms into their elite Lefegii unit.

The last vestiges of the Roman Empire are gone, and although many would make claim to the imperial crown, we are its true descendants. With all the ancestral lands united under our wise rule, we can usher in a new era of prosperity. We are the children of Rome - the people of Romania! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Wallachia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must control at least three Capitals. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_FAITH] Faith. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Romania. [ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness on Armories, Castles, and Fortified Churches. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Build Armories, Castles, and Fortified Churches 20% faster.

The last vestiges of the Roman Empire are gone, and although many would make claim to the imperial crown, we are its true descendants. With all the ancestral lands united under our wise rule, we can usher in a new era of prosperity. We are the children of Rome - the people of Romania! [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Requirements:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Wallachia. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must control at least two Capitals. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have at least 75% [ICON_JFD_SOVEREIGNTY] Sovereignty. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Costs:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture. [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Rewards:[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE]------------------------- [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Civilization becomes known as Romania. [ICON_BULLET]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]+1 [ICON_HAPPINESS_1] Happiness on Armories, Castles, and Fortified Churches. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Build Armories, Castles, and Fortified Churches 20% faster.

The last vestiges of the Roman Empire are gone, and although many would make claim to the imperial crown, we are its true descendants. With all the ancestral lands united under our wise rule, we can usher in a new era of prosperity. We are the children of Rome - the people of Romania! {1_LeaderName} has united his people and formed the Romanian nation.
